snippet: Tide has enlisted Betty White in its campaign to introduce Tide Vivid White and Bright, new names for Tide with Bleach Alternative and Tide with Bleach powder.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes Procter & Gamble's Tide enlists actress Betty White in its campaign to introduce Tide Vivid White and Bright, new names for Tide with Bleach Alternative and Tide with Bleach powder.
lead_paragraph: Tide has enlisted Betty White in its campaign to introduce Tide Vivid White and Bright, new names for Tide with Bleach Alternative and Tide with Bleach powder.

headline.seo: Betty White to Star in New Commercials for Tide
headline.main: A Detergent Picks a Star Who Shares Its Name
headline.print_headline: A Detergent Picks a Star Who Shares Its Name
